name: Mori no Oukoku
overview: Mori No Oukoku is a classic tactical rpg game that features different characters and good 2d graphics. The plot is about a little boy that at the intro movie see the how the princess is taken to the castle. After that the stroy begins and the first partner is a raccoon that could talk with the help of the fairies. The boy will start a journey that will leave him through different places of the country: towns, mountains, woods, caves, etc And during the journey different character will join his group.
